text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 1991. ==Events== *4 May - The 36th Eurovision Song Contest is held at the Studio 15 di Cinecittà in Rome. Sweden wins the contest with the song "Fångad av en stormvind", performed by Carola. *1 October - Long running US animated comedy series The Simpsons begins broadcasting on television stations all across Italy for the first time. The series was premiered on Canale 5. ==Debuts== ===International=== *9 September - Tiny Toon Adventures (Canale 5) (1990-1995) *1 October - The Simpsons (Canale 5) (1989-present) *31 December - Marianne 1ère (Canale 5) (1990) * Samurai Pizza Cats (Odeon TV) (1991) * Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers (Rai 1) (1989-1990) * The Tom & Jerry Kids Show (Rai 1) (1990-1993) ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== {| class="wikitable" |- " ! Date || Name || Age || Cinematic Credibility |- |27 February |Nuccio Costa |65 |Italian television presenter |- |} ==See also== *List of Italian films of 1991
title: 1991 in Italian television
